title.value: Create a clone of a Questionnaire

description.value:
### Input - resourceId: reference to the Questionnaire resource that should be cloned - clone-operation: minor-version/major-version/copy Coding from codesystem: http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/cs/ehealth-clone-operation
### Output Bundle containing all resources that were created during the operation.
### Validation - New business versions require that the user has modifier-role: owner or co-author for the resource - New copy does not require that the user has a modifier-role. - New business version can be made only when no draft resource exists (having identical base identifier). - Read/search/create privileges are required for the resource types affected by $create-clone
